Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class IslandBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.IslandBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class IslandBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
IslandBoard models the game board. Above this are the workers' pawns and towers.
See Also:
Tile, Cloneable, Serializable, Serialized Form

    • indexOfNeighbouringTiles

      public java.util.Collection<Tile.IndexTile> indexOfNeighbouringTiles​(Tile.IndexTile index)
      Method used to discover tiles close to a specific tile.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the tile from which to look for nearby ones
      Returns:
      Return a Collection of tile's index close to the input index.
      See Also:
      Tile.IndexTile, Collection

    • changePosition

      public void changePosition​(Worker worker, Tile.IndexTile indexNewPosition) throws AlreadyOccupiedException
      Method used to change worker's position. It's used in the move method of god.
      Parameters:
      worker - The worker's instance that must change position.
      indexNewPosition - The indexTile of the new position on the board.
      Throws:
      AlreadyOccupiedException - Throws if the new position is already occupied
      See Also:
      Tile.IndexTile, Worker
